mapper.sql: rr.id, rr.user_id, rr.order_no, rr.recharge_amount, rr.actual_amount, rr.pay_type, rr.status, rr.pay_time, rr.third_party_no, rr.remark, rr.create_time, rr.update_time

, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.avatar as user_avatar, u.phone as user_phone, CASE rr.status WHEN 0 THEN '待支付' WHEN 1 THEN '支付成功' WHEN 2 THEN '支付失败' WHEN 3 THEN '已退款' ELSE '未知' END as status_desc, CASE rr.pay_type WHEN 'WECHAT' THEN '微信支付' WHEN 'ALIPAY' THEN '支付宝' WHEN 'BALANCE' THEN '余额支付' ELSE '未知' END as pay_type_desc
FROM recharge_records rr LEFT JOIN users u ON rr.user_id = u.id
